title: GzTopicSpec
description: Pair of gz topic name and gz message type sent on it

GzMsgType.description: Dot-delimitted gz message type; name prefixed with 'gz.msgs.'

GzTopicNameSpec.description: Components of gz topic names, describing how a final topic name is determined

suffix.description: Topic name suffix appended to any relevant topic prefixes
